meta.max_stay: Permanent Residence (Green Card) - Conditional for first 2 years

documents.title: Original Passport
documents.description: Valid for at least 6 months beyond intended entry.

documents.title: Source of Funds Evidence
documents.description: Comprehensive documentation proving the legal origin of the investment capital (Tax returns, sale deeds, gift letters, business records).

documents.title: Comprehensive Business Plan
documents.description: Matter of Ho compliant business plan showing how the investment will create 10 full-time jobs.

documents.title: Proof of Investment
documents.description: Wire transfer receipts, escrow agreements, and bank confirmation letters showing capital is 'at risk'.

documents.title: Regional Center Agreement (If applicable)
documents.description: Subscription agreement and offering documents if investing through a Regional Center.

documents.title: Civil Documents
documents.description: Birth certificates, marriage certificates, and police clearance certificates for all applicants.

steps_flow.title: Choose Project & Invest
steps_flow.description: Select a qualifying project (Direct or Regional Center) and transfer the capital ($800k or $1.05M).

steps_flow.title: File Form I-526
steps_flow.description: Attorney files the Immigrant Petition by Alien Investor with USCIS. Wait for approval (12-36 months).

steps_flow.title: NVC Processing
steps_flow.description: Once I-526 is approved, file DS-260 with the National Visa Center and pay fees.

steps_flow.title: Consular Interview
steps_flow.description: Attend the immigrant visa interview at the US Consulate (usually Mumbai for India).

steps_flow.title: Enter US & Receive Green Card
steps_flow.description: Enter the US to activate your Conditional Permanent Resident status (valid for 2 years).
